          <title>
            <string language="en">Gas molecules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gasmoleküle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Molécules de gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Moléculas do gás</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the representations of molecules of a single gas and a mixture of gases.</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Darstellungen der

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les représentations

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as respresentações das

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le rappresentazioni

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τις αντιπροσωπεύσεις των 
μορίων ενός ενιαίου αέριο και ενός μίγματος αερίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las representaciones de
